Adeyinka Oyekan nke Abụọ (30 Jụn 1911 ruo 1 Maachị 2003) bụ Oba nke Lagos site na 1965 ruo 2003
Ọ bụ nwa nwa Oba Oyekan I.
Nna Adeyinka bụ onye nkuzi Metọdist, Prince Kusanu Abiola Oyekan. Adeyinka Oyekan gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Methodist Boys na King's College, Lagos tupu ọ mụọ ọgwụ na Yaba College of Higher Education
Onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, ọ bụ onye otu Tinubu Methodist Church na onye bụbu onye nkuzi Sunday School.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Yaba Higher College, Adeyinka rụrụ ọrụ na General Hospital, Lagos na 1933.
N'afọ 1965, a họpụtara Adeyinka ka ọ bụrụ Oba ma mesịa bụrụ onye otu Western House of Chiefs; nke a bụ n'oge nsogbu na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa nke kpatara ọnwụ
Ọ chịrị dị ka Lagos Monarch site na 1965 ruo 2003
Adeyinka Oyekan bụ onye nke abụọ nke Ndị Kraịst nke Lagos, nke mbụ bụ Ibikunle Akitoye. A na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-eme udo na onye na-ewu àkwà mmiri n'oge ọchịchị ya
Adeyinka Oyekan bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ n'okpuru Methodist Mission na Amachara na Umuahia na East Central State nke Nigeria n'oge ahụ
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka sergeant na Third Field Ambulance 81st (W.A.) Division
Mgbe o jesịrị ozi agha, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ministri Ahụike nke Lagos Steeti.
Otu nwa a ma ama bụ nwa ya nwoke, Oba Mobandele Oyekan nke Ilado, onye aha ya dị ka eze bụ Onilado nke Ilado.
